{{cpp/regex/regex_traits/title|translate_nocase}}
{{cpp/regex/regex_traits/navbar}}
{{ddcl|1=
CharT translate_nocase( CharT c ) const;
}}

Obtains the comparison key for the character {{c|c}}, such that all characters that are equivalent to this character in the imbued locale, ignoring the case differences, if any, produce the same key.

When the regex library needs to match two characters {{tt|c1}} and {{tt|c2}} and the flag {{lc|std::regex_constants::icase}} is {{c|true}}, it executes {{c|1=regex_traits&lt;&gt;::translate_nocase(c1) == regex_traits&lt;&gt;::translate_nocase(c2)}}.

Standard library specializations of {{lc|std::regex_traits}} return {{c|std::use_facet&lt;std::ctype&lt;CharT&gt;&gt;(getloc()).tolower(c)}}, that is, convert {{c|c}} to lowercase, using the currently imbued locale.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|c|character that needs to be examined for equivalence, ignoring case}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The case-insensitive comparison key for {{c|c}} in the currently imbued locale.
